item.title: Big 3 bills heard in Senate Ed, Special Education bills to be heard this week - WSPTA
item.description: News article "Big 3 bills heard in Senate Ed, Special Education bills to be heard this week - WSPTA" from Washington St Pta.

item.title: 👍Jim Kowalkowski - Rural Education Center
item.description: Jim Kowalkowski signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Rural Education Center.
